00127 static inline void *_rt_named_malloc(void *start, unsigned long name, int size, int suprt)
00128 {
00129         int hook;
00130         void *adr;
00131         if ((hook = open(RTAI_SHM_DEV, O_RDWR)) <= 0) {
00132                 return 0;
00133         } else {
00134                 struct { unsigned long name, size; int suprt; } arg = { name, size, suprt };
00135 #ifndef _SHM_USE_LXRT
00136                 if ((size = ioctl(hook, NAMED_MALLOC, (unsigned long)(&arg)))) {
00137 #else
00138                 if ((size = rtai_lxrt(BIDX, SIZARG, NAMED_MALLOC, &arg).i[LOW])) {
00139 #endif
00140                         if ((adr = mmap(start, size, PROT_WRITE | PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED | MAP_FILE, hook, 0)) == (void *)-1) {;
00141 #ifndef SHM_USE_LXRT
00142                                 ioctl(hook, NAMED_FREE, name);
00143 #else
00144                                 rtai_lxrt(BIDX, sizeof(name), NAMED_FREE, &name);
00145 #endif
00146                                 adr = 0;
00147                         }
00148                 } else {
00149                         adr = 0;
00150                 }
00151         }
00152         close(hook);
00153         return adr;
00154 }

00246 static inline int rt_named_free(unsigned long name, void *adr)
00247 {
00248         int hook, size;
00249         if (!adr || (hook = open(RTAI_SHM_DEV, O_RDWR)) <= 0) {
00250                 return 0;
00251         }
00252 // no RT_NAMED_FREE needed, we release it all and munmap will do it through 
00253 // the vma close operation provided by shm.c
00254 #ifndef SHM_USE_LXRT
00255         if ((size = ioctl(hook, NAMED_SIZE, name))) {
00256 #else
00257         if ((size = rtai_lxrt(BIDX, sizeof(name), NAMED_SIZE, &name).i[LOW])) {
00258 #endif
00259                 if (munmap(adr, size)) {
00260                         size = 0;
00261                 }       
00262         }
00263         close(hook);
00264         return size;
00265 }
00266 #define rtai_free(name, adr)  \
00267         rt_named_free(name, adr)  // legacy
